bibl.title: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, May 26, [1896]

div1.p: Lazear regrets that he missed his mother's visit, but that he hopes to see her this week. He also discusses financial issues.

div1.head: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, May 26, [1896]
div1.p:
I was very
sorry to miss you
yesterday afternoon.

I understood you
to say on Saturday that
you would not come
to the hospital until
Wednesday. I did
not go to my room
until after lunch.
Then I went over to
the Woman's Exchange
but you had gone.

I will go out
to see you some time
this week. I shall
also be here every
day if you can come

I have some money
which I will hand
over to you

I cannot tell now
whether I can stay out at
Windsor over Sunday or not,
but I shall try to do
so. I will go to the
station at any rate.
